content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle indicates a groove oriented along the X-axis. We want high stiffness along X and low stiffness in other directions to facilitate sliding along the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
